title: Home
text: Welcome to the documentation for the WGOA repository. This site describes the structure, data sources, and workflows used in this project.

title: Home
text: Welcome to the documentation for the WGOA repository. This site describes the structure, data sources, and workflows used in this project.

title: Home
text:
Sections

code: Scripts for data wrangling and manipulation.
data: Raw input data used in analyses.
lookups: Tables and scripts for building lookup tables.
WGOA_source_data: Original datasets from the WGOA survey.
wgoa_data_rpath_fitting: Processed data ready for RPath model fitting.

title: Code
text: Here we have all the code associated with the data wrangling.

title: Code
text:
Folder structure
Scripts are separated by their main function:

r_files <- list.files(path = "~/WGOA-Ecopath-Rpath/code", pattern = "\\.R$", full.names = FALSE)

cat(paste0("- ", r_files, collapse = "
"))

- akfin_to_EwE_format_v2.R
- akfin_wgoa_catch_2023.R
- bioenergetic_GOA_Q10_aveTemp_script.R
- Delta_correction.R
- FourSystems_comp.R
- FourSystems_functions.R
- GAP_get_biomass_stratum.R
- GAP_get_cpue.R
- GAP_get_cpue_guild.R
- ggraph_webplot_Rpath.R
- GOA_rpath_setup.R
- mammals_birds_salmon_biomass_timeseries.R
- multistanza_maturity_proportions.R
- pedigree_coversion_Rpath_EwE.R
- race_biomass_timeseries_var_sd_se_cv.R
- race_biomass_timeseries_var_sd_se_cv_general_code.R
- REEM_download_functions.R
- REEM_fooddata_functions.R
- ROMS_data_transformation_anomaly.R
- ROMS_output_WGOA_EGOA.R
